categories.title: Work Environment, Equipment and Hazardous Tasks

competencies.statement: I clearly understand my role and what is expected of me at work.
My role expectations are consistent and manageable.
I feel confident in my duty of care for others as part of my role.
The tasks I am expected to do are clearly defined.
The expectations in my role are aligned and supportive of each other.
My tasks and work standards are consistent and well-communicated.
The work I do feels valuable and purposeful.
I have opportunities to participate in decision-making processes.
I have control over my workload.
I can influence how my work is carried out.
My skills are fully utilized in my current role.
I have a balanced level of interaction with people in my work.
My workload is reasonable and achievable within the given time.
I manage demands and deadlines effectively.
The expectations of my competence and responsibilities are realistic.
I have a variety of tasks in my work.
My work is meaningful and cohesive.
My job requires a balanced level of alertness and concentration.
I feel safe and supported when working with aggressive or distressed people.
I am rarely exposed to traumatic events or situations at work.
I receive adequate support during periods of transition at work.
My workplace has a stable structure with minimal disruption.
Workplace changes are communicated clearly and in a timely manner.
I feel connected and supported, even when working far from home.
I have opportunities for social interaction, even when working alone.
I feel safe and comfortable when working in private homes.
My workload is well-balanced, whether I am working remotely or in the office.
I manage time pressure effectively, even when working remotely.
My work schedule allows for reasonable time management.
My work pace is self-directed and manageable.
My work is varied and engaging, even when working remotely.
My work includes a variety of tasks that keep me engaged.
My work schedule allows for flexibility and balance, even when doing shift work.
My work schedule allows for flexibility and balance.
My working hours are predictable and manageable.
My working hours are reasonable and allow for a healthy work-life balance.
My work is meaningful and aligns with my goals.
I am able to complete work within a reasonable timeframe.
I have consistent work availability and know when I will be needed.
I feel secure in my job and do not worry about redundancy.
My employment is stable and well-protected by labour laws.
My job is secure, and my employment terms are clear.
Communication within my team is clear and effective.
I have positive and supportive relationships with colleagues and supervisors.
Conflicts at work are resolved fairly and respectfully.
I feel safe from harassment, bullying, and victimization in the workplace.
I have access to social support when needed at work.
Power dynamics at work are fair and respectful.
I feel connected and included in my workplace community.
My leaders provide clear vision and objectives.
My leaders have a management style that suits the nature of our work.
My leaders listen to complaints and suggestions attentively.
Information is shared openly and transparently by leadership.
My leaders provide adequate communication and support.
Accountability is upheld by leadership at all levels.
My workplace decisions are made fairly and consistently.
My workplace decisions are consistent and well-considered.
Power is used responsibly and ethically by leadership.
Communication within my workgroup is effective and supportive.
I feel supported in solving problems and developing personally.
My organization has well-defined and agreed-upon objectives.
Policies and procedures are applied fairly and consistently.
My efforts are recognized and rewarded fairly and in a timely manner.
I feel valued for the work I do.
I have opportunities for skill development and career growth.
I receive adequate support from my supervisors and colleagues.
I have access to the support services I need to perform well at work.
I receive the information and training necessary to succeed in my role.
My performance is regularly and constructively evaluated.
My contributions are acknowledged and encouraged by supervisors.
Communication with my supervisors is clear and effective.
My organization has a shared vision and clear objectives.
I am given the support and resources needed to improve my performance.
Fairness is upheld in all supervisory decisions.
Digital tools and surveillance are used appropriately and transparently.
My workplace fosters a culture of trust, honesty, respect, and civility.
Interactions at work are respectful and considerate.
My work tasks and schedule allow for a healthy work-life balance.
My work does not conflict with my home life.
I am able to recover and recharge after work.
I feel safe from abuse in my workplace.
My workplace is free from threats and intimidation.
I feel protected from physical, verbal, or sexual assault at work.
My workplace is committed to preventing gender-based violence.
I feel respected regardless of my race, gender identity, or other personal attributes.
My workplace respects all gender identities.
My workplace respects my religion or beliefs.
My workplace respects all sexual orientations.
My workplace is inclusive of all abilities.
My workplace values employees of all ages.
I feel connected and included in my workplace community.
My tasks are meaningful and fair.
I am treated with respect and not subjected to name-calling or insults.
My contributions are valued and not undermined by others.
I receive constructive feedback instead of public criticism.
I am provided with the necessary information and resources for my job.
Workplace gossip and rumours are discouraged.
My deadlines are reasonable and achievable.
I have access to reliable and well-maintained equipment.
My workplace conditions are safe and conducive to work.
I have the necessary tools and resources to complete my work tasks.
I feel safe working in extreme or challenging conditions.
My work environment is stable and secure.
